query: SELECT category AS label, total_sales AS value FROM sales_by_film_category ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
explanation: This chart visualizes the distribution of sales across different movie categories, helping identify the most profitable genres.

query: SELECT category AS label, CAST(total_sales AS float) AS value FROM sales_by_film_category ORDER BY total_sales DESC;
explanation: This bar chart displays the total sales generated by each film category, providing insights into which genres are most popular among customers.

query: SELECT CAST(SUM(total_sales) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_film_category;
explanation: This KPI card displays the total revenue generated from all film rentals, providing a quick snapshot of the business's overall financial performance.

query: SELECT 'Total Revenue' AS label, CAST(SUM(total_sales) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_film_category;
explanation: This KPI card displays the total accumulated revenue from all film categories.

query: SELECT store AS label, CAST(total_sales AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_store;
explanation: This bar chart compares the total sales performance between different store locations.

query: SELECT category AS label, CAST(total_sales AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_film_category ORDER BY value DESC;
explanation: This block visualizes the total sales generated by each film category, helping identify the most profitable genres.

query: SELECT 'Total Revenue' AS label, CAST(SUM(amount) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM payment;
explanation: This block displays the total revenue collected from all rentals to provide a quick overview of the business's overall financial performance.

query: SELECT (c.first_name || ' ' || c.last_name) AS label, CAST(SUM(p.amount) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM customer c JOIN payment p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5;
explanation: This block highlights the top 5 customers who have spent the most on rentals, identifying the most valuable clients.

query: SELECT category AS label, CAST(total_sales AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_film_category ORDER BY value DESC;
explanation: This block shows the total sales generated by each film category, allowing us to identify the most profitable genres.

query: SELECT category AS label, CAST(total_sales AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_film_category ORDER BY value DESC
explanation: Displaying total sales for each film category to identify the most profitable genres.

query: SELECT category AS label, CAST(total_sales AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_film_category ORDER BY value DESC;
explanation: Displaying total sales revenue for each film category from the pre-computed sales_by_film_category view.

query: SELECT 'Total Revenue' as label, CAST(SUM(amount) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM payment
explanation: Calculating the total cumulative revenue from all historical rental payments to establish a baseline for business performance.

query: SELECT category AS label, CAST(total_sales AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_film_category ORDER BY total_sales DESC LIMIT 5
explanation: Identifying the most profitable film categories to optimize inventory acquisition and marketing focus.

query: SELECT country AS label, CAST(COUNT(id) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM customer_list GROUP BY country ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5
explanation: Analyzing the geographic distribution of the customer base to identify key markets.

query: SELECT rating AS label, CAST(AVG(rental_rate) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM film GROUP BY rating ORDER BY value DESC
explanation: Comparing the average rental price across different content ratings to understand pricing distribution.

query: SELECT 'Total Revenue' AS label, CAST(SUM(amount) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM payment
explanation: Calculates total revenue across all stores and time periods.

query: SELECT 'Total Rentals' AS label, CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM rental
explanation: Calculates the total number of rentals processed.

query: SELECT 'Active Customers' AS label, CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM customer WHERE active = 1
explanation: Counts the total number of active customers in the database.

query: SELECT category AS label, CAST(total_sales AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_film_category ORDER BY total_sales DESC
explanation: Visualizes revenue generated by each film category using the pre-defined sales view.

query: SELECT CONCAT(c.first_name, ' ', c.last_name) AS label, CAST(SUM(p.amount) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM customer c JOIN payment p ON c.customer_id = p.customer_id GROUP BY c.customer_id, c.first_name, c.last_name ORDER BY value DESC LIMIT 5
explanation: Identifies the top 5 customers who have spent the most on rentals.

query: SELECT f.rating AS label, CAST(SUM(p.amount) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM film f JOIN inventory i ON f.film_id = i.film_id JOIN rental r ON i.inventory_id = r.rental_id JOIN payment p ON r.rental_id = p.rental_id GROUP BY f.rating ORDER BY value DESC
explanation: Shows which film ratings (G, PG, R, etc.) generate the most revenue.

query: SELECT CAST(SUM(amount) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM payment
explanation: Calculates the total revenue from all payments in the database.

query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM rental
explanation: Total number of rentals recorded in the system.

query: SELECT CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM customer
explanation: Counts the total number of customers in the database.

query: SELECT category AS label, CAST(total_sales AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_film_category ORDER BY total_sales DESC
explanation: Aggregates sales by film category to show which genres are most profitable.

query: SELECT store AS label, CAST(total_sales AS FLOAT) AS value FROM sales_by_store
explanation: Compares the performance of different store locations based on total sales.

query:
SELECT f.title AS label, CAST(COUNT(r.rental_id) AS FLOAT) AS value 
FROM film f 
JOIN inventory i ON f.film_id = i.film_id 
JOIN rental r ON i.inventory_id = r.inventory_id 
GROUP BY f.title 
ORDER BY value DESC 
LIMIT 10
explanation: Shows the most popular films based on rental frequency.

query: SELECT 'Revenue' AS label, CAST(SUM(amount) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM payment
explanation: Calculates the total revenue from all payments in the database.

query: SELECT 'Rentals' AS label, CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM rental
explanation: Total number of rentals recorded in the system.

query: SELECT 'Customers' AS label, CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM customer
explanation: Counts the total number of customers in the database.

query: SELECT rating AS label, CAST(COUNT(*) AS FLOAT) AS value FROM film GROUP BY rating ORDER BY value DESC
explanation: Distribution of films by MPAA rating.

query: SELECT CAST(revenue.total - cost.total AS FLOAT) as value FROM (SELECT SUM(amount) as total FROM payment) revenue, (SELECT SUM(f.replacement_cost) as total FROM inventory i JOIN film f ON i.film_id = f.film_id) cost
explanation: Calculates the net profit by subtracting the total replacement cost of all inventory from the total revenue generated through payments.

query:
SELECT 'Total Revenue' as label, CAST(SUM(amount) AS FLOAT) as value FROM payment
UNION ALL
SELECT 'Inventory Cost' as label, CAST(SUM(f.replacement_cost) AS FLOAT) as value FROM inventory i JOIN film f ON i.film_id = f.film_id
explanation: Compares total revenue vs total replacement cost to visualize the financial health.

query:
SELECT 'Net Profit/Loss' as label, CAST(rev.r - cost.c AS FLOAT) as value 
FROM (SELECT SUM(amount) as r FROM payment) rev, 
     (SELECT SUM(f.replacement_cost) as c FROM inventory i JOIN film f ON i.film_id = f.film_id) cost
explanation: Calculates total net profit as revenue minus inventory cost.

query: SELECT 'Total Revenue' as label, CAST(SUM(amount) AS FLOAT) as value FROM payment
explanation: Displays the total revenue generated from all rental payments.

query: SELECT 'Inventory Value' as label, CAST(SUM(f.replacement_cost) AS FLOAT) as value FROM inventory i JOIN film f ON i.film_id = f.film_id
explanation: Displays the total replacement cost of all inventory items.

query:
WITH StoreRevenue AS (
    SELECT s.store_id, SUM(p.amount) as revenue
    FROM store s
    JOIN staff st ON s.store_id = st.staff_id
    JOIN payment p ON st.staff_id = p.staff_id
    GROUP BY s.store_id
),
StoreCost AS (
    SELECT i.store_id, SUM(f.replacement_cost) as cost
    FROM inventory i
    JOIN film f ON i.film_id = f.film_id
    GROUP BY i.store_id
)
SELECT CAST(r.store_id AS TEXT) as label, CAST(r.revenue - c.cost AS FLOAT) as value
FROM StoreRevenue r
JOIN StoreCost c ON r.store_id = c.store_id
explanation: Shows the net profit contribution from each store.
